description: First, the bad news: a court yesterday declined to immediately enjoin Musk and DOGE, as New Mexico and 13 other states had asked it to do. But don’t panic: it was a heavy lift to get what they were asking for, and even though they didn’t get it now, their quest continues. With this case […]
title: State Plaintiffs Lose A Disappointing Battle, While Musk And DOGE Get Closer To Losing The War

description: Here’s a dumb thing that happened: Elon Musk’s ExTwitter just agreed to pay Donald Trump $10 million to settle a lawsuit that ExTwitter had already won. (Yes, you read that right: already won.) This is becoming something of a pattern in tech and media these days — call it the digital-age protection racket. The plot […]
title: ExTwitter Pays Trump $10M to Settle Case It Had Already Won

description: Apparently, ICE is feeling it might deal with a bit more backlash than normal now that Trump is back in charge and promising to expel as many immigrants as he can as quickly as he can. Rather than deal with it like grownups with big boy pants and black ICE shirts, the agency has decided […]
title: ICE Wants To Set Up A Social Media Dragnet So It Can Figure Out Who’s Criticizing The Agency

description: Microsoft Office 2021 Professional is the perfect choice for any professional who needs to handle data and documents. title: Daily Deal: Daily Deal: The Microsoft Office Professional 2021 for Windows + Windows 11 Pro Bundle

description: Here’s a neat trick for saving taxpayers billions of dollars: just make stuff up! The innovator of this approach — and I […]
title: It’s Easy To Save Billions In Taxpayer Funds When Everything Is Made Up

description: Last November you might recall that Wired released an excellent report documenting how it was trivial to buy the sensitive and detailed movement data of U.S. military and intelligence workers as they moved around Germany. The culprit, as usual, was a global collection of super dodgy data brokers and adtech firms that see little in the way […]
title: Lithuanian Adtech Firm And Florida Data Broker Trafficked In Sensitive U.S. Military And Intelligence Worker Location Data

description: Long time readers of Techdirt will recall the deluge of posts we did years ago on trademark disputes within the craft beer industry. title: Trademarks: Sometimes David Is Petty And Goliath Deserves To Win
